name: The Illusionist: A tale of a top hat
name_original: The Illusionist: A tale of a top hat
description:
Made for Mini Jamp 90: Illusion

Restriction: Only 1 character.

This was a project for my first game jam. Its super rough, but i hope it brings at least 1 person happiness.

(Please do not flip the tree, it does not like being upside down)
